00028 #include "RDFSyntaxMediator.h"
00029 RDFSyntaxMediator::RDFSyntaxMediator()
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00033 string *node= new string[3];
00034 
00035 void RDFTripleHandle(void* dictionaryTriples, const raptor_statement* triple){
00036     
00037     char *returned_subject;
00038     char *returned_predicate;
00039     char *returned_object;
00040     
00041     returned_subject = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->subject, triple->subject_type, NULL, NULL);
00042     node [0] = returned_subject;
00043     
00044     returned_predicate = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->predicate, triple->predicate_type, NULL, NULL);
00045     node[1] = returned_predicate;
00046     
00047     returned_object = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->object, triple->object_type, triple->object_literal_datatype, triple->object_literal_language);
00048     node[2] = returned_object;
00049         
00050     ((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->checkTriple(node);
00051     //cout<<"triple:"<<node[0]<<" "<<node[1]<<" "<<node[2]<< " .\n";
00052     *(((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->ntriples) = *(((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->ntriples) + 1;
00053     
00054     free (returned_subject), free (returned_predicate), free(returned_object);
00055     
00056 }
00057 
00058 void RDFFullTripleHandle(void* dictionaryTriples, const raptor_statement* triple){
00059     
00060     char *returned_subject;
00061     char *returned_predicate;
00062     char *returned_object;
00063     
00064     returned_subject = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->subject, triple->subject_type, NULL, NULL);
00065     node [0] = returned_subject;
00066 
00067     returned_predicate = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->predicate, triple->predicate_type, NULL, NULL);
00068     node[1] = returned_predicate;
00069     
00070     returned_object = (char*)raptor_statement_part_as_string(triple->object, triple->object_type, triple->object_literal_datatype, triple->object_literal_language);
00071     node[2] = returned_object;
00072     
00073     //cout<<"triple:"<<node[0]<<" "<<node[1]<<" "<<node[2]<< " .\n";
00074         
00075     int subject = ((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(node[0], VOC_SUBJECT);
00076     int predicate = ((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(node[1], VOC_PREDICATE);
00077     int object = ((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->dictionary->retrieveID(node[2], VOC_OBJECT);
00078     
00079     ((DictionaryTriples *)dictionaryTriples)->triples->insert(subject, predicate, object);
00080     
00081     free (returned_subject), free (returned_predicate), free(returned_object);
00082     
00083 }
00084 
00085 void
00086 serialize_triple(void* rdf_serializer, const raptor_statement* triple) 
00087 {
00088   raptor_serialize_statement((raptor_serializer*)rdf_serializer, triple);
00089 }
00090 
00091 //save namespaces for serializing
00092 void relay_namespaces(void* namespacesData, raptor_namespace *nspace)
00093   {
00094    ((vector<raptor_namespace*>*)namespacesData)->push_back(nspace);
00095   }
00096   
00097 bool 
00098 RDFSyntaxMediator::parsing(char *pathFile,DictionaryTriples dictionaryTriples)
00099 {
00100     
00101 
00102     unsigned char *uri_string;
00103     raptor_uri *uri, *base_uri;
00104 
00105     raptor_init();
00106 
00107     rdf_parser=raptor_new_parser("guess");
00108 
00109     if (dictionaryTriples.triples==NULL) //parse dictionary
00110     {
00111         raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, &dictionaryTriples,RDFTripleHandle);
00112     }
00113     else {
00114             raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, &dictionaryTriples,RDFFullTripleHandle);
00115     }
00116     raptor_set_namespace_handler(rdf_parser, &namespaces, relay_namespaces);
00117     
00118   
00119     uri_string=raptor_uri_filename_to_uri_string(pathFile);
00120     uri=raptor_new_uri(uri_string);
00121     base_uri=raptor_uri_copy(uri);
00122 
00123     raptor_parse_file(rdf_parser, uri, base_uri);
00124 
00125     raptor_free_parser(rdf_parser);
00126 
00127     raptor_free_uri(base_uri);
00128     raptor_free_uri(uri);
00129     raptor_free_memory(uri_string);
00130 
00131     raptor_finish();
00132 return true;
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool 
00136 RDFSyntaxMediator::init_serialize(char *pathFile, char *format){
00137     
00138     unsigned char *uri_string;
00139     raptor_uri *uri, *base_uri;
00140     
00141     raptor_init();
00142     
00143     rdf_parser=raptor_new_parser("ntriples");
00144     
00145     try{
00146         rdf_serializer = raptor_new_serializer(format); //format can be e.g. rdfxml
00147         raptor_serialize_start_to_filename(rdf_serializer, pathFile);
00148         
00149         raptor_start_parse(rdf_parser, NULL);
00150         raptor_set_statement_handler(rdf_parser, rdf_serializer, serialize_triple);
00151         
00152         int i=0;
00153         
00154         //set namespaces if presented in previous parser
00155         if (namespaces.size()>0){
00156         for (i=0;i<namespaces.size();i++);
00157             {
00158                 raptor_serialize_set_namespace_from_namespace(rdf_serializer, namespaces[i]);
00159             }
00160         }
00161     }
00162      
00163     catch( char * str ) {
00164       cout << "Exception while conversing to "<<format<<": " << str << '\n';
00165     }
00166     
00167     return true;
00168 }

00170 bool 
00171 RDFSyntaxMediator::serialize_statement(string subject,string predicate,string object){
00172     
00173     
00174     size_t buffer_len;
00175     
00176     
00177     //buffer_len = subject.length()+predicate.length()+object.length()+5;
00178     //unsigned char* buffer = new unsigned char[buffer_len];
00179     //cout<<"(len)subject predicate object:("<<buffer_len<<")"<<subject<<" "<<predicate<<" "<<object<<".\n";
00180     //fflush(stdout);
00181     //char* buffer = new char[buffer_len];
00182     string statement;
00183     statement.append(subject).append(" ").append(predicate).append(" ").append(object).append(" .\n");
00184     //cout<<"statement:"<<statement<<"\n";
00185     //cout<<"object:"<<object<<"(len:"<<object.length()<<"\n";
00186     //fflush(stdout);
00187     /*
00188     strcpy((char*)buffer,(char*)subject.c_str());
00189     strcat((char*)buffer," ");
00190     strcat((char*)buffer,(char*)predicate.c_str());
00191     strcat((char*)buffer," ");
00192     strcat((char*)buffer,(char*)object.c_str());
00193     strcat((char*)buffer," .\n");
00194     */
00195     //cout<<"buffer:"<<buffer<<"|\n";
00196     //fflush(stdout);
00197     // use '1' last parameter to run without buffering
00198     
00199     //raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, (unsigned char*)buffer, buffer_len, 1);
00200     raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, (unsigned char*)statement.c_str(), statement.length(), 0);
00201     
00202     //delete [] buffer;
00203     
00204 }
00205 
00206 bool 
00207 RDFSyntaxMediator::end_serialize(){
00208     raptor_parse_chunk(rdf_parser, NULL, 0, 1); /* no data and is_end = 1 */
00209     raptor_serialize_end(rdf_serializer);
00210     raptor_free_serializer(rdf_serializer);
00211     raptor_free_parser(rdf_parser);
00212     raptor_finish();
00213     return true;
00214 }
